content: meet trixie the triceratops trixie is one of the friendliest dinosaurs you will ever meet she loves munching on ferns and playing in the streams and waterfalls she also loves spending time with her family materials you need -worsted-weight yarn 4-ply in green and cream the u k equivalent is aran and aus/nz is 8 ply for my triceratops i used hobby lobby s i love this yarn in the colors mid green and ivory -g 4 mm crochet hook -12 mm black safety eyes -fiberfill or your stuffing of choice -bent tip tapestry needle -scissors -stitch marker -straight pins abbreviation key abbreviations are in u s terms single_crochet single_crochet st/sts stitch es slip_stitch slip_stitch decrease decrease join the next 2 stitches together increase increase 2 single_crochet in the next stitch half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet triple crochet blo back loops only r1 round 1 repeat repeat ** repeat the group of instructions between the asterisks the number of times indicated note all rounds are worked continuously that is vs joined rounds
